name: Heroes Garden
description:
Welcome to Heroes Garden!

This game is a mashup of Plants vs. Zombies and HoMM3. Your objective is to defend the left border of the map from The Forces of Evil (charging from the rignt border). 

Place the defenders by selecting them from the top panel and place them on the  map grid by left mouse click. 

Test your skill by playing through 5 different levels and leave feedbac!

Disclaimer:
I do not own any assets or IP neither from HoMM3 nor Palnts vs. Zombies
